summary.span: 定義參與 Web Form 驗證的物件必須實作的屬性和方法。

span.span: Defines the properties and methods that objects that participate in Web Forms validation must implement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個介面的類別代表一個可能的使用者輸入的錯誤。Classes that implement this interface represent a possible user input error. 當呼叫方法時，類別更新其屬性以表示是否發生錯誤。When the method is called, the class updates its property to signify whether the error occurred. 屬性包含錯誤發生時，您可以顯示的錯誤狀況的文字描述。The property contains a text description of the error condition that you can display when the error occurs. 類別會實作這個介面，而且其他所有 ASP.NET 驗證伺服器控制項類別是都繼承自。The class implements this interface, and all other ASP.NET validation server control classes inherit from . 如需驗證伺服器控制項和其運作方式的資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 驗證控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef)。For information on validation server controls and how they work, see [ASP.NET Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef). 如需如何開發自訂 ASP.NET 驗證伺服器控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 自訂函式以驗證 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3ece2ad-2e88-40df-bb8b-3fe53ecf21ab)。For details on how to develop custom ASP.NET validation server controls, see [How to: Validate with a Custom Function for ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3ece2ad-2e88-40df-bb8b-3fe53ecf21ab). ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 開發人員會存取這個屬性，宣告式驗證的伺服器控制項的開頭標記。ASP.NET developers access this property declaratively in the opening tag of a validation server control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
